text: David Martin Scott Steel, Baron Steel of Aikwood (born 31 March 1938) is a British retired Liberal politician. Steel served as the Leader of the Liberal Party from 1976 until its merger with the Social Democratic Party in 1988 to form the Liberal Democrats. He served as a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1965 to 1997 and as a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) from 1999 to 2003. == References == Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democrats (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Leaders of the Liberal Democrats (UK) Category:Leaders of the Liberal Party (UK) Category:Liberal Party (UK) MPs Category:Liberal Democrat Life Peers Category:Members of the Privy Council of the United Kingdom Category:Scottish Parliament Members Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1966–1970 Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:Politicians from Fife
